name: undoable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If something is undoable, it cannot be done: The goal inspired a feeling that the team could do what had been seen as undoable. Most sane human beings faced with such a seemingly impossible request would dismiss it as undoable.
More examplesFewer examplesIt's very challenging, although not undoable if you get proper support.After her election, she intends to do some of those things that in the past people had considered undoable.Some transactions should be recognized as undoable in the beginning and not even attempted.
